casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Matthew N. Leerberg, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, C. Bailey King, Jr., Charlotte, Attorney at Law, For Medflow, Inc. Harold C. Spears, Attorney at Law, Christopher P. Raab, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, For Ehmann, Eugene K., et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of March 2018 by Defendants to Dismiss Appeal: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018." Jackson, J., recused
